summary: The document is an identification form related to the JFK Assassination System, detailing Robert Scheer's personal information, including residences, employment history, and foreign connections, as part of a US Army request for a national agency check. Originally classified, it has been regraded as unclassified with some deletions.
key_findings: Document is part of the JFK Assassination System records.
Details a request for a national agency check on Robert Scheer by the US Army.
Includes personal information such as residences, employment history, and foreign connections.
Originally classified, now unclassified with deletions.
Indicates Scheer had various foreign connections and employment history in different countries.
